# Appendix
```{r appendix, results="asis"}
# Get all the labels
all_labels <- knitr::all_labels()

# Print out code along with labels
for (label in all_labels) {
  if (label == "setup" || label == "appendix") {
    next
  }

  code <- knitr::knit_code$get(label)

  cat("###", label, "\n")
  cat("```\n")
  cat(code, sep = "\n")
  cat("```\n")
}
```
